title: What is going on with my league?!?!
body: So for a few days now I have been unable to get into a game. I get through picking and banning and then when I get into the connection screen it immediately disconnects me from the game. To fix this problem, I have tried to continuously reconnect but every time it just boots me out. Because this problem happened to me, I have lost 16 LP and have 20 minute lower priority queue for something I couldn't control. How do I fix this problem? I don't deserve this lower priority queue but I'll wait it out if I have to.

replies.body: If you're unable to reconnect to the game then there may be a network problem that's blocking you from reaching the game server.  Try the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in this case, and go over each step to make sure your settings are allowing a connection to be made.  Hope it helps!
